snippet: The hawks who watch government debt are starting to focus on what they consider the under-reported financial obligations of countries like Slovenia, Malta and others.
abstract: Government debt watchers in Europe, including ratings agencies, global regulators and bond lawyers, are starting to focus on what they consider the under-reported financial obligations of countries like Slovenia, Malta and others, concerned about hidden dangers.
lead_paragraph: The hawks who watch government debt are starting to focus on what they consider the under-reported financial obligations of countries like Slovenia, Malta and others.

headline.seo: ‘Hidden’ State Guarantees Add to Europe’s Debt Worries
headline.main: State Debt Guarantees That Are ‘Hidden’ Add to Worries in Europe
headline.print_headline: State Debt Guarantees That Are ‘Hidden’ Add to Worries in Europe
